RuleSet.Name: src/Schema/ISchemaTableTable.java

GenFile.Name: fileISchemaTableTableJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$

RuleSet.GenRule: extends I$reference SchemaDef SchemaName$$TableName$Table
, I$reference SchemaDef SchemaName$$TableName$Table
$reference ForTable TableName$
$switch IsInstanceMethod yes declInstServerProc default declClassServerProc$
boolean $leadlower Name$( I$DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj$iterate Params( each declServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );
boolean $leadlower Name$( I$DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj, I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Obj obj$iterate Params( each declServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );
, $implJavaAtomType$ $leadlower Name$
$switch IsInstanceMethod yes declInstServerObjFunc default declClassServerObjFunc$
$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$$reference RetTable Name$Buff $leadlower Name$( I$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj$iterate Params( each declServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );

$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$$reference RetTable Name$Buff $leadlower Name$( I$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj, I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Obj obj$iterate Params( each declServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );
$switch IsInstanceMethod yes declInstServerListFunc default declClassServerListFunc$
$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$$reference RetTable Name$Buff[] $leadlower Name$( I$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj$iterate Params( each declServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );

$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$$reference RetTable Name$Buff[] $leadlower Name$( I$reference RetTable DefSchemaName$SchemaObj schemaObj, I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Obj obj$iterate Params( each declServerMethodParam empty empty )$ );

/** * Read the derived $TableName$ buffer instance by primary key. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param PKey The primary key of the $TableName$ instance to be read. * * @return The buffer instance for the specified primary key, or null if there is * no such existing key value. */ $poptop Table DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff readDerived( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$PKey PKey );

/** * Lock the derived $TableName$ buffer instance by primary key. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param PKey The primary key of the $TableName$ instance to be locked. * * @return The buffer instance for the specified primary key, or null if there is * no such existing key value. */ $poptop Table DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff lockDerived( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$PKey PKey );

/** * Read all $TableName$ instances. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @return An array of derived buffer instances, potentially with 0 elements in the set. */ $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff[] readAllDerived( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization );
$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes declReadTableDerivedByInhIndexes default declReadTableDerivedByBaseIndexes$
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable declReadTableDerivedByIndexes$$iterate Index( each declReadTableDerivedByNonPrimaryIndex )$
$iterate Index( each declReadTableDerivedByIndex )$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes empty default declReadTableDerivedByIndex$
$switch IsUnique yes declReadTableDerivedByUniqueIndex default declReadTableDerivedByDuplicateIndex$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes declReadTableBasePrimarySuffix default Suffix$
$reference Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex Suffix$

/** * Read the derived $poptop Table TableName$ buffer instance identified by the unique key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @return The buffer instance for the specified key, or null if there is * no such existing key value. */ $poptop Table DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff readDerivedBy$declReadTableSuffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$ );

/** * Read an array of the derived $poptop Table TableName$ buffer instances identified by the duplicate key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @return An array of derived buffer instances for the specified key, potentially with 0 elements in the set. */ $DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff[] readDerivedBy$declReadTableSuffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$ );

/** * Read the specific $TableName$ buffer instance identified by the primary key. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param PKey The primary key of the $TableName$ instance to be locked. * * @return The buffer instance for the specified primary key, or null if there is * no such existing key value. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. */ $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff readBuff( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$PKey PKey );

/** * Lock the specific $TableName$ buffer instance identified by the primary key. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param PKey The primary key of the $TableName$ instance to be locked. * * @return The buffer instance for the specified primary key, or null if there is * no such existing key value. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. */ $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff lockBuff( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $DefSchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$PKey PKey );

/** * Read all the specific $TableName$ buffer instances. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @return All the specific $TableName$ instances in the database accessible for the Authorization. */ $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff[] readAllBuff( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization );
$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes declReadTableBuffByInhIndexes default declReadTableBuffByBaseIndexes$
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable declReadTableBuffByIndexes$$iterate Index( each declReadTableBuffByNonPrimaryIndex )$
$iterate Index( each declReadTableBuffByIndex )$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes empty default declReadTableBuffSPs$
$declReadTableBuffByIndex$
$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes declPageTableBuffByInhIndexes default declPageTableBuffByBaseIndexes$

$iterate Index( each declPageTableBuffByIndex )$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes empty default declPageTableBuffSPs$
$switch PageData yes maybe_declPageTableBuffByIndex default empty$
$switch IsUnique yes empty default declPageTableBuffByDuplicateIndex$

/** * Read the specific $poptop Table TableName$ buffer instance identified by the unique key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @return The buffer instance for the specified key, or null if there is * no such existing key value. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. */ $DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff readBuffBy$declReadTableSuffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$ );

/** * Read an array of the specific $poptop Table TableName$ buffer instances identified by the duplicate key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @return An array of derived buffer instances for the specified key, potentially with 0 elements in the set. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. */ $DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff[] readBuffBy$declReadTableSuffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$ );

/** * Read a page of all the specific $TableName$ buffer instances. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @return All the specific $TableName$ instances in the database accessible for the Authorization. */ $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff[] pageAllBuff( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each declCommaOptPriorArg )$ );

/** * Read a page array of the specific $poptop Table TableName$ buffer instances identified by the duplicate key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @return An array of derived buffer instances for the specified key, potentially with 0 elements in the set. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. */ $DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff[] pageBuffBy$declReadTableSuffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$$poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each declCommaOptPriorArg )$ );

/** * Move the specified buffer up in the chain (i.e. to the previous position.) * * @return The refreshed buffer after it has been moved */ $poptop Table DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff moveBuffUp( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$, int revision );

/** * Move the specified buffer down in the chain (i.e. to the next position.) * * @return The refreshed buffer after it has been moved */ $poptop Table DefSchemaName$$poptop Table TableName$Buff moveBuffDown( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each declCommaColumnArg )$, int revision );

/** * Get the next $Name$ id generator value. * * @param PKey The primary key of the $TableName$ instance generating the id. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. * * @return The next id value as generated by the cluster database. */ short next$Name$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $poptop Table reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$popto Table reference BaseClass TableName$PKey PKey );
/** * Get the next $Name$ id generator value.$reference Dispenser reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. * * @return The next id value as generated by the cluster database. */ short next$Name$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$reference Dispenser reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implNextIdGenDeclAttr )$ );
* * @param arg$Name$ The $poptop Table TableName$ key attribute of the instance generating the id.
, $implJavaAtomType$ arg$Name$

/** * Get the next $Name$ id generator value.$reference Dispenser reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. * * @return The next id value as generated by the cluster database. */ long next$Name$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$reference Dispenser reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implNextIdGenDeclAttr )$ );

/** * Get the next $Name$ id generator value. * * @param PKey The primary key of the $TableName$ instance generating the id. * * @throws CFLibNotSupportedException thrown by client-side implementations. * * @return The next id value as generated by the cluster database. */ UUID next$Name$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $popto Table reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$popto Table reference BaseClass TableName$PKey PKey );

/** * Create the instance in the database, and update the specified buffer * with the assigned primary key. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param Buff The buffer to be created. */ void create$TableName$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff Buff );

/** * Read all the specific $TableName$ instances from the database. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @return An array of the $TableName$ instances visible to the Authorization. */ $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff[] readAll$TableName$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization );

/** * Update the instance in the database, and update the specified buffer * with any calculated changes imposed by the associated stored procedure. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param Buff The buffer to be updated. */ void update$TableName$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff Buff );

/** * Delete the instance from the database. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param Buff The buffer to be deleted. */ void delete$TableName$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $DefSchemaName$$TableName$Buff Buff );$declDeleteTableByInheritedIndexes$
$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes declDeleteTableByInhIndexes default declDeleteTableByBaseIndexes$
$iterate Index( each declDeleteTableByNonPrimaryIndex empty empty )$$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable declDeleteTableByInheritedIndexes$
$iterate Index( each declDeleteTableBySpecialIndex empty empty )$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes empty default declDeleteTableByIndex$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes declDeleteTableByPrimaryIndex default declDeleteTableByIndex$

/** * Delete the $poptop Table TableName$ instances identified by the key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ */ void delete$poptop Table TableName$By$Suffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each implNextIdGenDeclAttr )$ );
/** * Delete the $poptop Table TableName$ instances identified by the key $Suffix$. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param argKey The key identifying the instances to be deleted. */ void delete$poptop Table TableName$By$Suffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $DefSchemaName$$TableName$By$Suffix$Key argKey );

/** * Delete the $poptop Table TableName$ instance identified by the primary key attributes. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information.$iterate Columns( each implCommentKeyAttr empty empty )$ */ void delete$poptop Table TableName$By$Suffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization$iterate Columns( each implNextIdGenDeclAttr )$ );
/** * Delete the $poptop Table TableName$ instance identified by the primary key. * * @param Authorization The session authorization information. * * @param argKey The primary key identifying the instance to be deleted. */ void delete$poptop Table TableName$By$Suffix$( $SecSchemaName$Authorization Authorization, $poptop Table reference BaseClass DefSchemaName$$poptop Table reference BaseClass TableName$PKey argKey );
